00001 /*
00002 ###############################################################################
00003 #
00004 #  EGSnrc egs++ voxelized human phantom geometry
00005 #  Copyright (C) 2015 National Research Council Canada
00006 #
00007 #  This file is part of EGSnrc.
00008 #
00009 #  EGSnrc is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00010 #  the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the
00011 #  Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your
00012 #  option) any later version.
00013 #
00014 #  EGSnrc is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00015 #  WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
00016 #  FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for
00017 #  more details.
00018 #
00019 #  You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
00020 #  along with EGSnrc. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00021 #
00022 ###############################################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Author:          Iwan Kawrakow, 2008
00025 #
00026 #  Contributors:    Frederic Tessier
00027 #
00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A "Voxelized Human Phantom" (VHP) geometry.
00031 #
00032 #  Although a VHP geometry is just a XYZ geometry, due to the huge number of
00033 #  voxels one has to be more careful with memory use for media indices, etc.
00034 #  That's why this separate geometry implementation. With Richard Kramer's
00035 #  phantom data the implementation requires ~12 MB to hold all the organ data
00036 #  in memory. Richard's ASCII phantom data was also transformed into binary
00037 #  format with the result that loading them is almost instantaneous.
00038 #
00039 #  For now the implementation only provides the macro geometry, i.e., no
00040 #  spongiosa micro matrices. Adding the micro matrices is the next step.
00041 #
00042 ###############################################################################
00043 */
00044

00069 EGS_VoxelInfo *EGS_VoxelGeometry::v = 0;
00070 int            EGS_VoxelGeometry::nv = 0;

00072 VHP_OrganData::VHP_OrganData(const char *fname, int slice_min, int slice_max)
00073     : nslice(0), ok(false) {
00074     ifstream data(fname,ios::binary);
00075     if (!data) {
00076         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: failed to open file %s for reading\n",
00077                    fname);
00078         return;
00079     }
00080     char endian;
00081     data.read(&endian,sizeof(endian));
00082     char my_endian = egsGetEndian();
00083     if (endian != my_endian) {
00084         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: wrong endianess. \n"
00085                    "This machine has endianess %d, data was written on %d\n"
00086                    "This requires byte swaping, which has not been implemented yet\n",
00087                    (int)my_endian,(int)endian);
00088         return;
00089     }
00090     data.read((char *)&dx, sizeof(dx));
00091     data.read((char *)&dy, sizeof(dy));
00092     data.read((char *)&dz, sizeof(dz));
00093     data.read((char *)&nslice,sizeof(nslice));
00094     if (slice_min < 0) {
00095         slice_min = 0;
00096     }
00097     if (slice_max > nslice) {
00098         slice_max = nslice;
00099     }
00100     int nwant = slice_max - slice_min;
00101     slices = new VHP_SliceInfo [nwant];
00102     nx = 0, ny = 0;
00103     int is = 0;
00104     for (int islice=0; islice<nslice; ++islice) {
00105         if (islice >= slice_min) {
00106             slices[is].readData(data);
00107             int ni, nj;
00108             slices[is++].getSliceDimensions(ni,nj);
00109             if (ni > nx) {
00110                 nx = ni;
00111             }
00112             if (nj > ny) {
00113                 ny = nj;
00114             }
00115         }
00116         else {
00117             VHP_SliceInfo tmp;
00118             tmp.readData(data);
00119         }
00120         if (islice == slice_max - 1) {
00121             break;
00122         }
00123     }
00124     nxy = nx*ny;
00125     nslice = slice_max - slice_min;
00126     if (data.fail()) {
00127         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: I/O error while reading data\n");
00128     }
00129     else {
00130         ok = true;
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 VHP_OrganData::~VHP_OrganData() {
00135     if (nslice) {
00136         delete [] slices;
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void VHP_RowInfo::readData(istream &in) {
00141     unsigned short n;
00142     in.read((char *)&n,sizeof(n));
00143     if (n != nbin) {
00144         if (nbin > 0) {
00145             delete [] pix;
00146             delete [] org;
00147             nbin = 0;
00148         }
00149     }
00150     if (n < 1) {
00151         return;
00152     }
00153     if (!nbin) {
00154         nbin = n;
00155         pix = new unsigned short [nbin+1];
00156         org = new unsigned char [nbin];
00157     }
00158     in.read((char *)pix,(nbin+1)*sizeof(unsigned short));
00159     in.read((char *)org,nbin*sizeof(unsigned char));
00160 }
00161 
00162 void VHP_SliceInfo::readData(istream &in) {
00163     if (rinfo) {
00164         delete [] rinfo;
00165         rinfo = 0;
00166     }
00167     in.read((char *)&firstr,sizeof(firstr));
00168     in.read((char *)&lastr,sizeof(lastr));
00169     int nrow = lastr-firstr+1;
00170     if (nrow > 0) {
00171         rinfo = new VHP_RowInfo [nrow];
00172         for (int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) {
00173             rinfo[j].readData(in);
00174         }
00175     }
00176 }
00177 #endif

00179 EGS_VHPGeometry::EGS_VHPGeometry(const char *phantom_file,
00180                                  const char *media_file, int slice_min, int slice_max,
00181                                  const string &Name) :
00182     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), vg(0), micros(0), nmicro(0) {
00183     organs = new VHP_OrganData(phantom_file,slice_min,slice_max);
00184     if (!organs->isOK()) {
00185         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: failed to construct organ data\n");
00186         delete organs;
00187         organs = 0;
00188         return;
00189     }
00190     ifstream med_data(media_file);
00191     if (!med_data) {
00192         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: failed to open media data file %s\n",
00193                    media_file);
00194         delete organs;
00195         organs = 0;
00196         return;
00197     }
00198     int norg;
00199     med_data >> norg;
00200     if (norg < 1) {
00201         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: %d organs in media data file %s?\n",
00202                    norg,media_file);
00203         delete organs;
00204         organs = 0;
00205         return;
00206     }
00207     int j;
00208     for (j=0; j<256; ++j) {
00209         organ_media[j] = -1;
00210         organ_names[j] = "Undefined";
00211         organ_micro[j] = -1;
00212     }
00213     char buf[1024];
00214     med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00215     for (j=0; j<norg; ++j) {
00216         int iorg, imed;
00217         char c;
00218         med_data >> iorg >> imed >> c;
00219         med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00220         if (iorg < 0 || iorg > 255)
00221             egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: bad organ number %d on line %d\n",
00222                        iorg,j+2);
00223         else {
00224             organ_media[iorg] = imed;
00225         }
00226         organ_names[iorg] = c;
00227         organ_names[iorg] += buf;
00228     }
00229     int nmed;
00230     med_data >> nmed;
00231     med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00232     vector<string> media_names;
00233     vector<int> media_indeces;
00234     for (j=0; j<nmed; ++j) {
00235         med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00236         string med(buf);
00237         media_names.push_back(med);
00238         media_indeces.push_back(EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(med));
00239     }
00240     egsInformation("EGS_VHPGeometry: media information\n");
00241     for (j=0; j<nmed; ++j) {
00242         egsInformation("Medium %s registered as medium number %d\n",
00243                        media_names[j].c_str(),media_indeces[j]);
00244     }
00245     for (j=0; j<256; ++j) {
00246         if (organ_media[j] >= 0) {
00247             if (organ_media[j] >= nmed) {
00248                 egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: invalid medium index %d\n",
00249                            organ_media[j]);
00250             }
00251             else {
00252                 organ_media[j] = media_indeces[organ_media[j]];
00253             }
00254         }
00255     }
00256     EGS_Float dx, dy, dz;
00257     int nx, ny, nz;
00258     organs->getVoxelSizes(dx,dy,dz);
00259     organs->getPhantomDimensions(nx,ny,nz);
00260     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(nx,ny,nz,dx,dy,dz);
00261     nreg = nx*ny*nz;
00262     nmacro = nreg;
00263     egsInformation("Phantom size in voxels: x=%d y=%d z=%d\n",nx,ny,nz);
00264     egsInformation("Voxel sizes: dx=%g dy=%g dz=%g\n",dx,dy,dz);
00265 }
00266 
00267 void EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros(EGS_Input *input) {
00268     if (!vg || !organs) {
00269         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: called for an invalid "
00270                    "VHP geometry\n");
00271         return;
00272     }
00273     if (!input->getInputItem("micro matrix")) {
00274         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: no micro matrix definitions\n");
00275         return;
00276     }
00277     vector<EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *> mv;
00278     string dir;
00279     input->getInput("micro matrix folder",dir);
00280     EGS_Float t_bsc;
00281     bool ok = true;
00282     const static char *err_msg =
00283         "EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: wrong/missing '%s' input\n";
00284     int err = input->getInput("BSC thickness",t_bsc);
00285     if (err || t_bsc < 0) {
00286         egsWarning(err_msg,"BSC thickness");
00287         ok = false;
00288     }
00289     string tb_medium, bm_medium;
00290     err = input->getInput("TB medium",tb_medium);
00291     if (err) {
00292         egsWarning(err_msg,"TB medium");
00293         ok = false;
00294     }
00295     err = input->getInput("BM medium",bm_medium);
00296     if (err) {
00297         egsWarning(err_msg,"BM medium");
00298         ok = false;
00299     }
00300     if (!ok) {
00301         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: wrong/missing inputs found\n"
00302                    "  => no micro matrices set for use\n");
00303         return;
00304     }
00305     int tb_med = addMedium(tb_medium), bm_med = addMedium(bm_medium);
00306     vector<string> minput;
00307     while (!input->getInput("micro matrix",minput)) {
00308         delete input->takeInputItem("micro matrix");
00309         if (minput.size() < 2) {
00310             egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: 'micro matrix' input"
00311                        " requires at least two inputs => ignored\n");
00312             continue;
00313         }
00314         string fname = dir.size() ? egsJoinPath(dir,minput[0]) : minput[0];
00315         EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *mcluster = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(
00316             vg->dx,vg->dy,vg->dz,t_bsc,tb_med,bm_med,fname.c_str());
00317         if (!mcluster->isValid()) {
00318             egsWarning("failed to construct micro cluster from %s\n",
00319                        fname.c_str());
00320             delete mcluster;
00321         }
00322         else {
00323             bool ok = true;
00324             vector<int> orgs;
00325             for (int i=1; i<minput.size(); ++i) {
00326                 S_STREAM s(minput[i].c_str());
00327                 int org;
00328                 s >> org;
00329                 if (s.fail()) {
00330                     egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: invalid input %s "
00331                                "for micro matrix %s\n",minput[i].c_str(),
00332                                minput[0].c_str());
00333                     ok = false;
00334                 }
00335                 else {
00336                     if (org < 0 || org > 255) {
00337                         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: invalid input"
00338                                    " %d for micro matrix %s\n",org,minput[0].c_str());
00339                         ok = false;
00340                     }
00341                     else {
00342                         orgs.push_back(org);
00343                     }
00344                 }
00345             }
00346             if (ok) {
00347                 mv.push_back(mcluster);
00348                 egsInformation("Using micro matrix data from\n    %s\nfor"
00349                                " organs:",fname.c_str());
00350                 for (int i=0; i<orgs.size(); ++i) {
00351                     egsInformation(" %d",orgs[i]);
00352                     organ_micro[orgs[i]] = mv.size()-1;
00353                 }
00354                 egsInformation("\n");
00355             }
00356             else {
00357                 delete mcluster;
00358             }
00359         }
00360     }
00361     if (mv.size() > 0) {
00362         if (nmicro > 0) {
00363             for (int i=0; i<nmicro; ++i) {
00364                 delete micros[i];
00365             }
00366             delete [] micros;
00367         }
00368         nmicro = mv.size();
00369         micros = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster* [nmicro];
00370         nmax = 0;
00371         for (int i=0; i<nmicro; ++i) {
00372             micros[i] = mv[i];
00373             int nr = micros[i]->nxy*micros[i]->nz;
00374             int nm = micros[i]->mxy*micros[i]->mz;
00375             if (nm*nr > nmax) {
00376                 nmax = nm*nr;
00377             }
00378         }
00379         nmacro = vg->nxy*vg->nz;
00380         EGS_I64 ntot = nmax;
00381         ntot *= nmicro;
00382         ntot += nmacro;
00383         if (ntot > 2147483647) egsFatal("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: "
00384                                             "too many micro regions\n");
00385         nreg = nmacro + nmax*nmicro;
00386         egsInformation("Using regions 0...%d to identify macro voxels\n",
00387                        nmacro-1);
00388         egsInformation("Using regions %d...%d to identify micro voxels\n",
00389                        nmacro,nreg-1);
00390     }
00391 }
00392 
00393 EGS_VHPGeometry::~EGS_VHPGeometry() {
00394     if (organs) {
00395         delete organs;
00396     }
00397     if (vg) {
00398         delete vg;
00399     }
00400     if (nmicro > 0) {
00401         for (int j=0; j<nmicro; ++j) {
00402             delete micros[j];
00403         }
00404         delete [] micros;
00405     }
00406 
00407 }

00409 void EGS_VHPGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *,int,const int *) {
00410     egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMedia: don't use this method.\n"
00411                " Media are fixed by the organ data defining an VHP geometry\n");
00412 }

00414 void EGS_VHPGeometry::printInfo() const {
00415     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00416     if (isOK()) {
00417         egsInformation("  voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",vg->dx,vg->dy,vg->dz);
00418         egsInformation("  phantom size: %d %d %d\n",vg->nx,vg->ny,vg->nz);
00419     }
00420     else {
00421         egsInformation("  undefined VHP geometry\n");
00422     }
00423 }

00425 string EGS_VHPGeometry::type = "EGS_VHPGeometry";
00426 
00427 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00428 VHPBox EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::bm_boxes[64];
00429 bool   EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::bm_boxes_initialized = false;
00430 
00431 EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(
00432     EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz, EGS_Float bsc_thickness,
00433     int tb_med, int bm_med, const char *micro_file) : micros(0), vg(0),
00434     med_tb(tb_med), med_bm(bm_med) {
00435     //
00436     // *** open micro-matrix file
00437     //
00438     ifstream in(micro_file,ios::binary);
00439     if (!in) {
00440         egsWarning("EGS_MicroMatrixCluster: failed to open file %s\n",
00441                    micro_file);
00442         return;
00443     }
00444 
00445     //
00446     // *** read data
00447     //
00448     unsigned char Mx, My, Mz;
00449     in.read((char *)&Mx,sizeof(Mx));
00450     in.read((char *)&My,sizeof(My));
00451     in.read((char *)&Mz,sizeof(Mz));
00452     mx = Mx;
00453     my = My;
00454     mz = Mz;
00455     mxy = mx*my;
00456     nmic = mxy*mz;
00457     micros = new unsigned char *[nmic];
00458     in.read((char *)&Mx,sizeof(Mx));
00459     in.read((char *)&My,sizeof(My));
00460     in.read((char *)&Mz,sizeof(Mz));
00461     nx = Mx;
00462     ny = My;
00463     nz = Mz;
00464     nxy = nx*ny;
00465     int nxyz = nxy*nz, j;
00466     nreg = nxyz;
00467     {
00468         for (int j=0; j<nmic; ++j) {
00469             micros[j] = new unsigned char [nxyz];
00470             in.read((char *)micros[j],nxyz*sizeof(unsigned char));
00471             if (in.fail()) {
00472                 egsWarning("EGS_MicroMatrixCluster: I/O error while reading "
00473                            "%d'th micto-matrix from file %s\n",j+1,micro_file);
00474                 for (int i=0; i<=j; ++i) {
00475                     delete [] micros[j];
00476                 }
00477                 delete [] micros;
00478                 micros = 0;
00479                 return;
00480             }
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     //
00485     // *** initialize micro- and macro-voxel sizes and numbers
00486     //
00487     dx = Dx;
00488     dy = Dy;
00489     dz = Dz;
00490     dxi = 1/dx;
00491     dyi = 1/dy;
00492     dzi = 1/dz;
00493     EGS_Float ddx = Dx/nx, ddy = Dy/ny, ddz = Dz/nz;
00494     egsInformation("Macro voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",dx,dy,dz);
00495     egsInformation("Micro voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",ddx,ddy,ddz);
00496     egsInformation("Number of micros: %d %d %d\n",mx,my,mz);
00497     egsInformation("Number of micro-voxles: %d %d %d\n",nx,ny,nz);
00498 
00499     //
00500     // *** create an object for geometry computations
00501     //
00502     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(nx,ny,nz,ddx,ddy,ddz);
00503 
00504     //
00505     // *** initialize the 64 boxes needed for sub-micro-voxel energy deposition
00506     //     if needed
00507     //
00508     if (!bm_boxes_initialized) {
00509         bm_boxes_initialized = true;
00510         for (int ixm=0; ixm<2; ++ixm) {
00511             EGS_Float xmin = bsc_thickness*ixm;
00512             for (int ixp=0; ixp<2; ++ixp) {
00513                 EGS_Float xmax = ddx - bsc_thickness*ixp;
00514                 for (int iym=0; iym<2; ++iym) {
00515                     EGS_Float ymin = bsc_thickness*iym;
00516                     for (int iyp=0; iyp<2; ++iyp) {
00517                         EGS_Float ymax = ddy - bsc_thickness*iyp;
00518                         for (int izm=0; izm<2; ++izm) {
00519                             EGS_Float zmin = bsc_thickness*izm;
00520                             for (int izp=0; izp<2; ++izp) {
00521                                 EGS_Float zmax = ddz - bsc_thickness*izp;
00522                                 int ibox = ixm+2*ixp+4*iym+8*iyp+16*izm+32*izp;
00523                                 bm_boxes[ibox].xmin = xmin;
00524                                 bm_boxes[ibox].xmax = xmax;
00525                                 bm_boxes[ibox].ymin = ymin;
00526                                 bm_boxes[ibox].ymax = ymax;
00527                                 bm_boxes[ibox].zmin = zmin;
00528                                 bm_boxes[ibox].zmax = zmax;
00529                             }
00530                         }
00531                     }
00532                 }
00533             }
00534         }
00535     }
00536 
00537     //
00538     // *** process micro data. After this loop the mico-matrices will contain
00539     //     0  for TB voxels
00540     //     1  for BSC-only voxels (possible if BSC thickness > voxel size/2)
00541     //     2  for BM-only voxels (i.e., no TB neighbours)
00542     //    >2  index of VHPBox corresponding to the BSC layers found in the voxel
00543     //
00544     //     we also compute the TB, BM and BSC volumes
00545     //
00546     v_tb  = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00547     v_bm  = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00548     v_bsc = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00549     double tot_tb = 0, tot_bm = 0, tot_bsc = 0;
00550     for (j=0; j<nmic; ++j) {
00551         int iz = j/mxy;
00552         int iy = (j-iz*mxy)/mx;
00553         int ix = j-iz*mxy-iy*mx;
00554         int ixm = ix-1;
00555         if (ixm < 0) {
00556             ixm = mx-1;
00557         }
00558         int ixp = ix+1;
00559         if (ixp >= mx) {
00560             ixp = 0;
00561         }
00562         int iym = iy-1;
00563         if (iym < 0) {
00564             iym = my-1;
00565         }
00566         int iyp = iy+1;
00567         if (iyp >= my) {
00568             iyp = 0;
00569         }
00570         int izm = iz-1;
00571         if (izm < 0) {
00572             izm = mz-1;
00573         }
00574         int izp = iz+1;
00575         if (izp >= mz) {
00576             izp = 0;
00577         }
00578         EGS_Float bsc_vol = 0, bm_vol = 0, tb_vol = 0;
00579         for (int jx=0; jx<nx; ++jx) {
00580             for (int jy=0; jy<ny; ++jy) {
00581                 for (int jz=0; jz<nz; ++jz) {
00582                     int ireg = jx + jy*nx + jz*nxy;
00583                     if (micros[j][ireg]) {
00584                         int micxm = !(jx > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-1] :
00585                                       micros[ixm+iy*mx+iz*mxy][nx-1+jy*nx+jz*nxy]);
00586                         int micxp = !(jx < nx-1 ? micros[j][ireg+1] :
00587                                       micros[ixp+iy*mx+iz*mxy][jy*nx+jz*nxy]);
00588                         int micym = !(jy > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-nx] :
00589                                       micros[ix+iym*mx+iz*mxy][jx+(ny-1)*nx+jz*nxy]);
00590                         int micyp = !(jy < ny-1 ? micros[j][ireg+nx] :
00591                                       micros[ix+iyp*mx+iz*mxy][jx+jz*nxy]);
00592                         int miczm = !(jz > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-nxy] :
00593                                       micros[ix+iy*mx+izm*mxy][jx+jy*nx+(nz-1)*nxy]);
00594                         int miczp = !(jz < nz-1 ? micros[j][ireg+nxy] :
00595                                       micros[ix+iy*mx+izp*mxy][jx+jy*nx]);
00596                         if ((micxm && micxp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddx) ||
00597                                 (micym && micyp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddy) ||
00598                                 (miczm && miczp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddz)) {
00599                             micros[j][ireg] = 1; // i.e. all BSC
00600                             bsc_vol += 1;
00601                         }
00602                         else {
00603                             int ibox=micxm+2*micxp+4*micym+8*micyp+
00604                                      16*miczm+32*miczp;
00605                             micros[j][ireg] = ibox + 2;
00606                             if (!ibox) {
00607                                 bm_vol += 1;
00608                             }
00609                             else {
00610                                 double v =
00611                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].xmax-bm_boxes[ibox].xmin)*
00612                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].ymax-bm_boxes[ibox].ymin)*
00613                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].zmax-bm_boxes[ibox].zmin);
00614                                 v /= (ddx*ddy*ddz);
00615                                 bm_vol += v;
00616                                 bsc_vol += 1 - v;
00617                             }
00618                         }
00619                     }
00620                     else {
00621                         tb_vol += 1;
00622                     }
00623                 }
00624             }
00625         }
00626         egsInformation("Micro-matrix %d from %s:\n",j+1,micro_file);
00627         egsInformation("  TB volume fraction: %g\n",tb_vol/nxyz);
00628         egsInformation("  BM volume fraction: %g\n",bm_vol/nxyz);
00629         egsInformation(" BSC volume fraction: %g\n",bsc_vol/nxyz);
00630         egsInformation("               Total: %g\n",(tb_vol+bm_vol+bsc_vol)/nxyz);
00631         v_tb[j] = tb_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00632         v_bm[j] = bm_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00633         v_bsc[j] = bsc_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00634         tot_tb += tb_vol;
00635         tot_bm += bm_vol;
00636         tot_bsc += bsc_vol;
00637     }
00638     egsInformation("Average volume fractions:\n");
00639     egsInformation("  TB volume fraction: %g\n",tot_tb/(nmic*nxyz));
00640     egsInformation("  BM volume fraction: %g\n",tot_bm/(nmic*nxyz));
00641     egsInformation(" BSC volume fraction: %g\n",tot_bsc/(nmic*nxyz));
00642 }
00643 
00644 EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::~EGS_MicroMatrixCluster() {
00645 }
00646 #endif
00647 
00648 EGS_TestMicro::EGS_TestMicro(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz,
00649                              EGS_Float bsc_t,int tb_med, int bm_med,const char *micro_file,
00650                              const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name) {
00651     micro = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(Dx,Dy,Dz,bsc_t,tb_med,bm_med,micro_file);
00652     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(micro->mx,micro->my,micro->mz,Dx,Dy,Dz);
00653     nr = micro->nx*micro->ny*micro->nz;
00654     nreg = nr*micro->mx*micro->my*micro->mz;
00655 }

00657 void EGS_TestMicro::setMedia(EGS_Input *, int , const int *) {
00658     egsFatal("EGS_TestMicro::setMedia(EGS_Input*,int,const int *):\n"
00659              "  Don't use this method. Media are only set via the micro matrix"
00660              " data\n");
00661 }

00663 EGS_TestMicro::~EGS_TestMicro() {

00665 
00666 string EGS_TestMicro::type = "EGS_TestMicro";
00667 
00668 const static EGS_VHP_LOCAL char *vhp_error_msg1 =
00669     "createGeometry(VHP): wrong/missing %s input for micro_test geometry\n";
00670 
00671 extern "C" {
00672 
00673     EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00674         string type;
00675         int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00676         if (!err && type == "micro_test") {
00677             bool ok = true;
00678             vector<EGS_Float> vs;
00679             err = input->getInput("voxel sizes",vs);
00680             if (err || vs.size() != 3) {
00681                 egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'voxel sizes'");
00682                 ok = false;
00683             }
00684             EGS_Float bsc_t;
00685             err = input->getInput("BSC thickness",bsc_t);
00686             if (err) {
00687                 egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'BSC thickness'");
00688                 ok = false;
00689             }
00690             string tb_medium, bm_medium;
00691             int err1 = input->getInput("TB medium",tb_medium);
00692             int err2 = input->getInput("BM medium",bm_medium);
00693             if (err1) {
00694                 egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'TB medium'");
00695             }
00696             if (err2) {
00697                 egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'BM medium'");
00698             }
00699             if (err1 || err2) {
00700                 ok = false;
00701             }
00702             string micro_data;
00703             err = input->getInput("micro data file",micro_data);
00704             if (err) {
00705                 egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'micro data file'");
00706                 ok = false;
00707             }
00708             if (!ok) {
00709                 return 0;
00710             }
00711             int tb_med = EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(tb_medium);
00712             int bm_med = EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(bm_medium);
00713             EGS_TestMicro *result = new EGS_TestMicro(vs[0],vs[1],vs[2],bsc_t,
00714                     tb_med,bm_med,micro_data.c_str());
00715             result->setName(input);
00716             result->setLabels(input);
00717             return result;
00718         }
00719         string phantom, media;
00720         int err1 = input->getInput("phantom data",phantom);
00721         int err2 = input->getInput("media data",media);
00722         if (err1) egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): "
00723                                  "missing 'phantom data' input\n");
00724         if (err2) egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): "
00725                                  "missing 'media data' input\n");
00726         if (err1 || err2) {
00727             return 0;
00728         }
00729         vector<int> srange;
00730         err1 = input->getInput("slice range",srange);
00731         EGS_VHPGeometry *result;
00732         if (!err1 && srange.size() == 2 && srange[1] > srange[0]) result =
00733                 new EGS_VHPGeometry(phantom.c_str(),media.c_str(),srange[0],srange[1]);
00734         else {
00735             result = new EGS_VHPGeometry(phantom.c_str(),media.c_str());
00736         }
00737         if (!result->isOK()) {
00738             egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): failed to construct "
00739                        "geometry");
00740             delete result;
00741             return 0;
00742         }
00743         result->setName(input);
00744         result->setMicros(input);
00745         result->setLabels(input);
00746         return result;
00747     }
00748 
00749 }
